faqs.question: Are the plots in Sector 87 available through government schemes or private developers
faqs.answer: Plots in Sector 87 Gurugram are available through both government-allocated schemes, often managed by authorities like HSVP (formerly HUDA), and through plots developed by private real estate developers. faqs.question: What are the construction regulations and Floor Area Ratio FAR limits in Sector 87
faqs.answer: Construction regulations including FAR limits and ground coverage restrictions are governed by the Town and Country Planning Department Haryana (TCP). These norms dictate the maximum permissible built-up area and the number of floors allowed, typically G+3 or G+4 depending on the plot size and scheme. Buyers must consult the latest building bylaws applicable to their specific plot category to ensure compliant construction.
